name: Peruvian Bodywave
description:
5A Human Hair Extensions
100% Virgin Human Hair
Net weight: 95-100g 
Double drawn wefts with cuticle in tack
Color: Natural/ 1B
Texture:Bodywave
Inches:14-28

We ship orders on Monday Wednesday and Friday. Orders will be delivered within 7 DAYS. Larger orders (4 or more pieces) will be delivered within 12 DAYS. 
	If package is not arrived in 20 days we will grant 10% off next order. (all orders are tracked)

Return/Refund Policy:
Within one week after you have received your items, if goods are not washed, dyed, damaged, and or altered in any way you may contact us to return it. All shipping fees are charged to your account. We do refund the item(s) if not as described. The refund will be rendered once the item is returned in original condition. 

Care Tips:
Treat the hair as if it is your own.
Use good quality products.
Wash hair with cool or lukewarm water use small amount of shampoo.
Wash gently rinse with cool water and condition. 
Shake out let air dry then brush hair. (curls snap back when hair is completely dry)
~If you take care of the hair it can last up to a year~



FAQ:
How many bundles will I need?
For a partial sew in 2 bundles. If length is longer than 16 inches I suggest a third. If you have a closure I suggest 3 bundles and for a full sew in defiantly 4 bundles.

Why are my hair extensions getting tangled?
Your Hair Extensions can tangle due to dryness, oil & dirt build-up, salt water, chlorine and not combing (wide tooth comb) out your hair daily. Make sure to wash & condition your hair at least once a week, twice a week is better. Use hydrating drops or consult your stylist for more help.

Why does the color of the hair not match the pictures shown or description says?
Different monitors have different displays. The same color number may have a little color difference. The hair is in its natural color you could dye the hair if you need different color.

How do I leave feedback?
Send an email with your feedback and type your name at the bottom, nickname, order number, or anonymous

Why is my weave shedding?
If you cut the weft to install with out bond/sealing the ends it can cause shedding.

What products do you use? 
I tend to stay away hair spray because it stiffens the hair. I suggest Olive Oil products, Crème of Nature Argan, and Organix
